title: Power Automate Samples
desc: A set of sample flows for Power Automate to help you get started with common use cases

title: Sign to Sign Template Migration Tool
desc: A tool to assist with migration templates from one Sign account to another. Supports cross-shard commercial account migration, commercial to Sign For Gov and developer account to either commercial or Gov.

title: Acrobat Sign List Templates
desc: Java-based command-line tool to list all the library templates in an Acrobat Sign account (in CSV format)

title: Acrobat Sign List Web Forms
desc: Java-based command-line tool to list all the web forms in an Acrobat Sign account (in CSV format)

title: Acrobat Sign List Workflows
desc: Java-based command-line tool to list all the custom workflows in an Acrobat Sign account (in CSV format)

title: Dynamic Workflow
desc: Dynamic workflows allow users to specify the next participants within an agreement.

title: CEMT Boilerplate
desc: Boilerplate for custom email templates provided by Adobe Sign to get started. The templates pack includes PleaseSign, SignedAndFiled, Reminder, and Canceled.

title: Redlining Solution
desc: Allows for workflows to be triggered within Acrobat Sign to initiate document redlining for contract negotiations

title: Sign DocGen API Integration
desc: This application is developed showcase the integration of Document Generation - PDF services and Acrobat Sign. The application can be re-used for development/integration with other web applications.

title: Sign Bulk Downloading Tool
desc: One Stop Solution for actions in bulk.

title: AI Crazytown
desc: Takes a prompt and randomly generates an asset in either image, 3D object, video, or ascii format.
creator: Name (email)
